Sustainable Web Design: A Case Study from the University of Lausanne Digital products leave a massive carbon footprint. According to the Sustainable Web Manifesto: “If the Internet was a country, it would be the 4th largest polluter in the world.”
We need a sustainable web. While the need for sustainability has been around for a while, it’s now becoming a standard for digital products. Leading web organisations are providing practical and measurable recommendations for sustainable development, …
